content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Baihu Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Hello Mister Li, thank you for considering my apartment for rental. As a landlord, I would like to ensure that I get the best possible return on my investment. May I ask what your budget is for the rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I have a budget of 300 Euros per month. Can we negotiate?
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Of course, we can certainly negotiate. Based on the size and location of the apartment, I would suggest a rental price of 350 Euros per month. This would allow me to maximize my gains while still providing a reasonable rental for you. Would you be willing to consider this price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of 350 Euros per month. Thank you for your understanding.
```
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Thank you, Mister Li. I appreciate your willingness to agree to the rental price of 350 Euros per month. I am glad that we were able to come to an agreement that works for both of us. Please let me know if you have any other questions or concerns before the move-in date.
name: Heinrich Heine
